A basic repair toolkit. Unlikely to be suitable for advanced maintenance, but they could be useful in the hands of a thrifty technician. Contains different types and sizes of pliers, screws, adhesives and assorted fasteners. With enough knowledge and experience, this kit can be used for the creation of basic equipment.

Standard Ukrainian-issue military binoculars. Useful in the Zone in that they allow its owner to observe things from a distance. Very durable.\n

Tongs made from hardened steel, intended exclusively for handling artefacts. Due to specific mechanics of operation, there is no other way of removing an artefact from containers. The tongs will also let you avoid burns that normally follow touching an artefact with bare hands; they will not, however, protect you from effects of artefacts on your psyche and neural system. No true artefact hunter in the Zone ever leaves the base without a similar tool.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] technological item
 %c[ui_white] • %c[ui_gray_2] usable for handling artefacts
 %c[ui_white] • %c[ui_gray_2] essential for manipulating contents of artefact storage devices

The lead-lined metal container (LLMC) is a simple metal box with thick walls and foam inserts as well as a heavy lid with pressure-sealing mechanism. Specifically designed for transporting radioactive materials, in the Zone LLMC is most commonly employed as artefact storage and transportation device. It stops all radiation from leaking, thus ensuring safety of the user when in possession of artefacts. However, the device cannot be attached to the belt, which means that both positive and negative properties of artefacts won't apply.

The best tool for opening locks and unhinging doors. A common find in industrial areas. Some stalkers for reasons unknown keep it in their inventories in spite of its heavy weight. Low value. There was a famous Stalker who carried around a unique crowbar with the inscription saying "Property of Black Mesa". It is sought after to such an extent that some stalkers are searching for it as if they were looking for rare and valuable artefacts.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] everyday item
 %c[d_orange] • %c[ui_gray_2] unlimited usages

Because bolts are cheap and common, they are used as a cheap alternative for anomalies navigation. Small packs that contains a handful amount of bolts and empty bullets can always be found at traders and merchants.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] • %c[ui_gray_2] everyday item
 %c[d_orange] • %c[ui_gray_2] contains 20 to 30 bolts

Want to open cans of food, keep your mechanical gear tight, cut ropes or sharpen your best bullets? Use the universal and elegant Swiss knife. Packed in a small box. Commonly found in the Zone, so it is of little value. However, it can be utilised as a supportive material in both weapon and outfit repairs.

A light sleeping bag that will keep you warm and dry when you need to rest. Be sure to pick a safe spot with a possible escape route. The bag is automatically picked up after sleeping or if hit "cancel" button.

A bag containing a tent for camping, sheltering from rain and wind. Assembly and installation takes some time. In the Zone, it is best deployed in a place with escape routes in case of danger.

A reliable, water-proof source of fire in the Zone is essential not only for cooking meals, but also for lighting a smoke or something stronger before - knock on wood - a fight with a controller. This durable and robust metal gas lighter is a perfect choice in light of the Zone's toxic and harmful environment.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES: 
 %c[d_orange] • %c[ui_gray_2] usable for: %c[ui_gray_1] cooking, smoking

There is almost no point in carrying a lighter if you can't use it to light anything. Experienced stalkers always remember to fill their lighters with fuel before departing on longer excursions deep into the Zone. Commonly available "Carcinoleum" lighter fuel is relatively cheap and serves the purpose sufficiently well.
 
 %c[ui_gray_3]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_orange] • %c[ui_gray_2] usable for: %c[ui_gray_1] fuelling lighters (+100%)

Every stalker is aware of the importance of reliable weaponry. That's the reason a daily and thorough examination of your shooter is vital to your survival. Stalkers often count their ammo and clean it to minimise the risk of a weapon jam in the heat of battle.

A portable sleeping bag designed to keep the user warm and hidden at night.
